Sentencas: The performance of direct internal reforming solid oxide fuel cells (DIR-SOFCs) depends on the coupling of multiphysics field and electrode microstructure.
Titulo: Fine three-dimensional simulation of the heterogeneous anode of a solid oxide fuel cell with direct internal reforming

Sentencas: This study develops a heterogeneous model for a DIRSOFC anode based on a microstructure reconstructed using X-ray.
Titulo: Fine three-dimensional simulation of the heterogeneous anode of a solid oxide fuel cell with direct internal reforming

Sentencas: The control equations are accurately defined at the corresponding geometry characteristic in accordance with the actual physical phenomena.
Titulo: Fine three-dimensional simulation of the heterogeneous anode of a solid oxide fuel cell with direct internal reforming

Sentencas: The distributions of activation overpotential and molar fractions of substances are investigated.
Titulo: Fine three-dimensional simulation of the heterogeneous anode of a solid oxide fuel cell with direct internal reforming

Sentencas: The effects of total overpotential, prereforming extent, and operating temperature are discussed.
Titulo: Fine three-dimensional simulation of the heterogeneous anode of a solid oxide fuel cell with direct internal reforming

Sentencas: Electrochemistry reaction rate is faster than reforming reaction rate and is fluctuating at a microscale.
Titulo: Fine three-dimensional simulation of the heterogeneous anode of a solid oxide fuel cell with direct internal reforming

Sentencas: Total overpotential has an insignificant effect on CH4 conversion rate, but operating temperature has a significant effect on CH4 conversion rate and electrical performance of cell.
Titulo: Fine three-dimensional simulation of the heterogeneous anode of a solid oxide fuel cell with direct internal reforming

Sentencas: Higher prereforming extent of methane is beneficial for elevating electrical performance.
Titulo: Fine three-dimensional simulation of the heterogeneous anode of a solid oxide fuel cell with direct internal reforming

Sentencas: The present model is beneficial for the study on the relationship between the microstructure and cell performance.
